oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Ms. W. H. Cashion letter
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Letter from E. D. Pope, written on "The Confederate Veteran" letterhead, to Mr. W. H. Cashion regarding erecting a monument to Mr. S. A. Cunningham, late editor of "The Confederate Veteran," at his grave. The document was found in the Little-McKinney-Young House attic in Fayetteville in 2002 among files belonging to Thomas Cheatham Little. The original is in the collections of the Lincoln County Archives.
